messages.message: For AIHub Apps API, do we have a timeline on support Run App w/ file payload(s). I feel with us doing the traditional upload to fs then run app is not a good user experience especially since we can drag and drop the files directly within the UI itself and the FS never gets exposed
something we considered that’s on the backlog. there’s some technical concerns about supporting multi-part upload and other large data transfer problems for multiple endpoints
We support it today for converse. Do we feel this will change for converse in the future?
don’t think we would remove it for any existing features
I guess I’m curious why we wouldn’t support it for run app
